name: THE Interdisciplinary Science Forum | Washington, DC | 21 November 2024
content: Hosted in partnership with Schmidt Science Fellows, the forum will focus on fostering and rewarding interdisciplinary science research within the higher education ecosystem to offer innovative and inclusive solutions to our most pressing challenges today. The forum will convene scientific leaders, university and academic senior administrators, institute directors, funders and policymakers from across the globe to discuss and debate how we can best organise and support academic science through an interdisciplinary lens to advance scientific discovery. URL: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/2560038-1?pid=4868 Time: 8:00 AM - 10:00 PM Venue details: Omni Shoreham Hotel, 2500 Calvert Street Northwest, Washington, District of Columbia, 20008, United States Prices: Universities: USD 199.00, Corporate: USD 249.00
